title: Broken Link - Rate on GPlay store
body:
Hey guys,

Just a quick note, after submitting in-app feedback, the confirmation screen shows a link to rate the app on the Google Play store, but following this link results in a missing page.

Cheers,

replies.body:
Heyo! Sorry about that, you're right and that button totally doesn't work yet. :) 

When the app comes out of closed beta that button will go live.  We still do receive all of the star ratings sent through the feedback form though, so please do send ratings through there!
No, if u wait a while it will load, it is just quite slow, I had to wait 5 min. for it to appear, so that would be a "bug" I guess.
